forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 13 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
The evening envelops Downtown San Francisco in a calm embrace, with a soft veil of clouds draping over the city. As temperatures settle into the mild 50s, the gentle breeze whispers through the streets, bringing a refreshing optimism to the atmosphere. Tonight’s cool air invites the cozy and comforting, suggesting a light jacket or a warm sweater would be quite fitting to stave off the chill.

As dawn breaks tomorrow, a transformation awaits. The clouds are expected to part, revealing a canvas of blue that promises a tantalizing mix of sunshine and warmth, peaking near 66 degrees. The afternoon will usher in a slight cooling as breezes from the west southwest pick up, swirling delicately through the city, tempting one to wander the waterfront or step into a quiet café to relish a warm drink. Perhaps a leisurely stroll across the Golden Gate Park or a visit to the many intriguing galleries downtown will be the perfect way to enjoy this pleasant day, especially as the late morning light dances on the architectural wonders that weave the fabric of this iconic city.
